definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive

sentences.english: We are committed to carrying out settlement audit for construction engineering and calculating the construction cost impartially and fairly.
sentences.chinese: 对建设工程进行决算审计，公正公平地确定工程造价。

sentences.english: The criminal summary procedure is the result of the coordination between the fairness and the efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 刑事简易程序是公正与效率协调的产物。

sentences.english: This year's election was generally held to be free and fair.
sentences.chinese: 总的来看，今年的选举是自由和公正的。

sentences.english: think innocently and justly, and, if you speak, speak accordingly.
sentences.chinese: 坦诚和公正的思考，并且，当你说话时也要这样。

sentences.english: Add justice to the fast-flung round of human endeavor and you have civilization.
sentences.chinese: 人类所做的种种努力之中添公正便成其为文明。

sentences.english: Beyond this, I am in Birmingham because injustice is here.
sentences.chinese: 此外，我来伯明罕是因为这里存在著不公正。

sentences.english: Utility and justice are two major value goals that the criminal law pursues.
sentences.chinese: 公正与功利是刑事法追求的两大价值目标。
人民警察必须做到公正执法。

sentences.english: Thepeople cried out againsttheunjust imprisonment of the honest doctor.
sentences.chinese: 人们对不公正地囚禁那位正直的医生表示强烈不满。

sentences.english: At last the litigants could easily interfere in cases, which hurts the fairness of justice.
sentences.chinese: 三是案件易受当事人不正当干预，影响司法公正。

sentences.english: If an adminis. rative sanction is. obviously unfair, it may be amended by judgment.
sentences.chinese: 行政处罚显失公正的，可以判决变更。

sentences.english: Humility, justice and kindness are virtues.
sentences.chinese: 谦让，公正和善良是美德。

sentences.english: This new package will ensure peace and justice for the world.
sentences.chinese: 这个新的一揽子计划将保证世界的和平和公正。

sentences.english: I will be fair and impartial when recommending both rewards and punishment.
sentences.chinese: 在实行奖励与惩罚时我将保持公正不带偏见。

sentences.english: This is the great social injustice.
sentences.chinese: 这是极大的社会不公正。

definition: to bare one shoulder/(fig.) to side with/to discriminate in favor of
covert activities (election rigging etc)/under-the-table manipulations/black operations
